pageContext.claim: “Looking more & more like the Trump Campaign for President was illegally being spied upon (surveillance) for the political gain of Crooked Hillary Clinton and the DNC. Ask her how that worked out - she did better with Crazy Bernie. Republicans must get tough now. An illegal Scam!”
pageContext.analysis: There's no reason to believe that the Trump campaign was spied on at all — much less to Clinton's benefit. Trump regularly points to the FISA warrant that was issued to monitor Carter Page, but that was after Page left the campaign.
